description: Get account info based on user id
criteria: The assistant should get the account info based on the user id
user_utterance: My user id is gid://shopify/Customer/9058324939073, when did I sign up?

expected_conversation.content: My user id is gid://shopify/Customer/9058324939073, when did I sign up?

criteria: The return result is in JSON format: {'answer': '<assistant_response>', 'card_list': ['<product_1>', '<product_2>', '<product_3>']}
user_utterance: Do you have recommendation for hats?

expected_conversation.content: Do you have recommendation for hats?
{"answer": "We have the following products, which one do you want to know more about?", "card_list": ["Product 1", "Product 2", "Product 3"]}
